title: Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" Lightweight Hardside Suitcase With Silent Spinner Wheels; Purple;  21" carry-on hardside underseat luggage; Color: Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, Light Purple; ABS hard shell, steel rod; Capacity: 33L; Size: 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H); Weight: 5.62lb; 360 degree silent double spinner wheels
descriptions:
Introducing the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20"! This hardside underseat luggage is perfect for your 1-3 day trips. It is made of high-quality ABS hard shell material, ensuring durability and protection for your belongings.

The Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage comes in a variety of stylish colors including Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, and Light Purple. You can choose the color that suits your personal style.

With a capacity of 33 liters, this luggage provides ample space for your essentials. The dimensions of the luggage are 21.85 inches in length, 8.35 inches in width, and 14.76 inches in height. It weighs only 5.62lb, making it lightweight and easy to carry.

The luggage features 4 360-degree silent double spinner wheels, allowing for smooth and effortless movement. The steel rod handle ensures sturdy and comfortable handling. The TSA lock provides added security for your belongings.

Inside the luggage, you'll find a mesh zip pocket and elasticated straps to secure your items. The full capacity design maximizes the use of space and keeps your belongings organized.

Not only is the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage practical and functional, but it is also impact-resistant and scratch-resistant, ensuring that it will withstand the rigors of travel. The interior is designed to be durable and long-lasting.

The handle is made of stainless steel and is adjustable to three different lengths. It features a TPR soft handle with a straight handle design for added comfort.

Choose the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" for your next trip and experience convenience, durability, and style all in one!

Weighing only 5.62 pounds, this luggage is lightweight and easy to carry. Its high durability and scratch resistance ensure that it will withstand the wear and tear of travel.

The adjustable TPR soft handle with a straight handle design offers comfort and convenience. It also comes with three adjustable heights to suit your preference.

Upgrade your travel experience with the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20". Get yours today and enjoy hassle-free and stylish travels!
